content:
Hello #genomics community! We are down to a little less than 1.5 hours till our first session! Looking forward to a great week. As a reminder, in the first session, we are in a joint session with FHIR-I, so when you look at Whova, make sure to join the FHIR-I session, not the Clin Gen session:
image.png
Not the View Session with the X, but the View Session I circled.

Tuesday Q3 session (Joint with O&O) starts in 15 minutes!

As a reminder to everyone - Please join the Orders and Observations stream, not the Clinical Genomics stream!
Tuesday Q5 session starts, well, almost now! :smile:

Thanks everyone who attended! Please review the notes:
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CGW/2021-05+CG+WGM+Minutes
We will plan to quick approve them at the start of our first session tomorow.
Hello #genomics friends - Wednesday Q3 session starts in less than 15 minutes!
Last session for today starts in ~ 13 minutes!

In our WGM today I had mentioned another ClinVar identifier in addition to the variant_id. It is the "RCVaccession" that I run across in some of our client's VCF files instead of the ClinVar variant id. The dbSNP database also holds that identifier in NCBI json ftp files we use. Defined in the ClinVar data dictionary as: "The accession for a reviewed assertion, provided by NCBI after aggregating data from multiple submissions, or assigned to submissions from professional societies. Here is a sample dbSNP snippet of a json entry showing that: (it also has a bunch of hgvs equivalents also with SPDI, etc., etc., etc.)
{
"refsnp_id": "268",
"create_date": "2000-09-19T17:02Z",
"last_update_date": "2017-09-26T22:33Z",
"last_update_build_id": "150",

. . . 
        {
            "id": {
                **"type": "clinvar",
                "value": "RCV000001615.2"**
            },
            "revision_added": "150",
            "create_date": "2017-09-26T22:33Z",
            "submitter_handle": ""
        }
    ],
    "anchor": "NC_000008.11:0019956017:1:snv",
    "variant_type": "snv"
}

}
Hello #genomics ! First session of our last day starts in 5 minutes!
Hi #genomics - We only have 4 attendees, so please join if you can today :smile:
